Package com.dua3.utility.text

Class HtmlConverter

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.TagBasedConverter<String>
com.dua3.utility.text.HtmlConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
RichTextConverter<String>
public final class HtmlConverter extends TagBasedConverter<String>
A RichTextConverter that converts RichText to HTML.
